wikipedia_page.main: Mark A H Buckingham (born 10 November 1964) is a male retired British rower. Buckingham competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He represented England and won a silver medal in the eight, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland.

response: Mark Buckingham is a British comic book artist. He is best known for his work on Marvelman and Fables.
